FuncDef: The reset fwm dldp statistics command clears statistics about the DLDP module on a specified board. The reset fwm dldp statistics command clears statistics about the DLDP module on a specified board.
CLIs: reset fwm dldp statistics [ all ] slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates all statistics (including the statistics whose value is 0).
-

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
